author: ballcock
title: Katie Price admits she STILL hasn’t changed her will and if she died everything would go to ex husband Peter Andre
text:
TV Magazine WHAT ABOUT KIERAN? Katie Price admits she STILL hasn’t changed her will and if she died everything would go to ex husband Peter Andre 
The ex glamour model revealed she had a 'wake-up call' about her legal situation during Monday's episode of Loose Women By BETH ALLCOCK, Showbiz Reporter 13th February 2017, 1:34 pm
